00011 #ifndef IFTHENELSE_HPP
00012 #define IFTHENELSE_HPP
00013 
00014 namespace cupp {
00015 namespace kernel_magic {
00016 
00017 // primary template: yield second or third argument depending on first argument
00018 template<bool C, typename Ta, typename Tb>
00019 class IfThenElse;
00020 
00021 // partial specialization: true yields second argument
00022 template<typename Ta, typename Tb>
00023 class IfThenElse<true, Ta, Tb> {
00024   public:
00025     typedef Ta ResultT;
00026 };
00027 
00028 // partial specialization: false yields third argument
00029 template<typename Ta, typename Tb>
00030 class IfThenElse<false, Ta, Tb> {
00031   public:
00032     typedef Tb ResultT;
00033 };
00034 
00035 }
00036 }
00037 
00038 #endif // IFTHENELSE_HPP
